Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Frog, Obstacle

    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models a rectangular movable object on the screen. It is drawn using an image.

      • setPic

        public void setPic(java.lang.String fileName,
                   int orientation)
        Changes the image file that this Sprite uses to draw.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the case-sensitive file name
        orientation - the direction that the image file is facing

      • rotateBy

        public void rotateBy(int delta)
        Changes the direction the Sprite is facing by the given angle.
        Parameters:
        delta - change in angle measured in degrees

      • setDir

        Parameters:

      • getBoundingRectangle

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBoundingRectangle()

        Returns:
        the bounding Rectangle.

        Returns:
